author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a scenario 2026D67 where ME0 is replaced with GE0. This however needs changes in the configuration for muon digitization and local reconstruction to eliminate usage of ME0

#### PR validation:

Partially tested runTheMatrix new workflow 31034.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Need additional fixes before utilizing this workflow in regular test
title: Phase2-gex13 Add a scenario where ME0 is replaced by GE0
